attitudes through observation.
Examples of objectives which involve new skillsand methods of observation:
Objective:
By the end of the training each participant will havedemonstrated ten successful intrauterine deviceinsertions and five intrauterine device removals,according to written protocols, under the supervisionof a skilled physician.
Evaluation:
